pollIntervalMs.description: Polling interval for journal cursor advances.

source.description: Source identifier used in emitted events.

units.description: Filter to specific systemd units (empty = all units).

priorities.description: Syslog priorities to include (0=emerg..7=debug). Default excludes debug.

maxEntriesPerPoll.description: Max journal entries to process per polling cycle.

sinceBoot.description: If true, start reading from current boot. If false, start from tail.
